mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_DATE, o.ORDER_PRODUCT_PRICE, o.ORDER_PAYED_PRICE, o.DELIVERY_STATUS, o.REVIEW_YN, p.PRODUCT_NM, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE FROM TB_ORDER o JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_SEQ = p.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE o.USER_UUID = UUID_TO_BIN(#{userUuid})

SELECT o.ORDER_DATE, o.ORDER_PRODUCT_PRICE, o.ORDER_PAYED_PRICE, o.DELIVERY_STATUS, o.REVIEW_YN, p.PRODUCT_NM, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE, p.PRODUCT_SEQ FROM TB_ORDER o JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_SEQ = p.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE o.USER_UUID = UUID_TO_BIN(#{userUuid}) AND o.REVIEW_YN = 0

SELECT o.ORDER_DATE, o.ORDER_PRODUCT_PRICE, o.ORDER_PAYED_PRICE, o.DELIVERY_STATUS, o.REVIEW_YN, p.PRODUCT_NM, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE, r.REVIEW_CONTENT, r.REVIEW_TIME, r.REVIEW_SEQ FROM TB_ORDER o JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON o.PRODUCT_SEQ = p.PRODUCT_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW r ON o.PRODUCT_SEQ = r.PRODUCT_SEQ AND o.USER_UUID = r.USER_UUID WHERE o.USER_UUID = UUID_TO_BIN(#{userUuid}) AND o.REVIEW_YN = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = #{reviewSeq} AND USER_UUID = UUID_TO_BIN(#{userUuid})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW (USER_UUID, PRODUCT_SEQ, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_TIME) VALUES (UUID_TO_BIN(#{review.userUUID}), #{review.productSeq}, #{review.reviewContent}, #{review.reviewTime})
